Title: Requires the appointment of a transit dependent and para-transit dependent representative on the Niagara Frontier transportation authority
Summary: Requires the appointment of a transit dependent and para-transit dependent representative on the Niagara Frontier transportation authority.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to the Niagara Frontier transportation authority
